Message: My life wanes as time goes by...

This body slowly inches
its way towards certain death.
It won’t be long before I...!

I’m prepared to die
on the battlefield.

But, for my life to
end like this...!
Hey, what should I do?
I spoke to the twin blades,

telling them my family has
already chosen who’ll
take over once I’m gone.

Everyone’s well aware of
the kind of person I am.

Not taking you two away
must’ve been their way
of showing a dying person
at least some compassion.

If I had the choice,
I would’ve wanted to
die on the battlefield...
Not on some bed...
...To hell with this.

I can’t just do nothing each day,
waiting for my death...

I will outshine the founder...
and her legend...
No, I can still do it.
I still have <ct=3000>my death</ct>, right?

If I can’t outshine her
with my way of life,
then I’ll at least do it
with my moment of death...!
...I have to go.

The battlefield...
is waiting for me.
